articles.title: Technical View | 19,450 level remains crucial for further uptrend in Nifty50 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The Options data indicated that 19,500-19,600 is likely to be the key hurdle zone for the Nifty50, with 19,300 support, but in between, 19,400 seems to be crucial for either side of the trade.
articles.content: The Nifty50 snapped a three-day rally on November 7, as it remained under pressure throughout the session but cut down losses in the afternoon and closed flat with a negative bias on November 7. The … [+3020 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Powerful solar storm strikes! More possible today as solar winds rush towards the Earth - HT Tech
articles.description: On November 6, a strong solar storm struck the Earth and shockingly, sparked auroras as far south as Texas. But it appears that another solar storm is likely to hit today, as solar winds are expected to hit the planet soon.
articles.content: Last week, a forecast revealed that three coronal mass ejections had a probability of striking the Earth early this week. The forecast had given different probabilities based on how different circums… [+2122 chars]

articles.title: WeWork’s catastrophic collapse: Tech unicorn files for bankruptcy in US, Canada - OpIndia
articles.description: By August this year, WeWork had expressed "substantial doubt" about its ability to remain in business over the next year due to mounting losses and debt. | OpIndia News
articles.content:
Coworking startup WeWork has officially filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in a federal court in the United States, marking a decline for the former tech unicorn.

articles.title: The 2025 Ram Ramcharger is an electric truck that gets its EV juice from a gas-powered generator - TechCrunch
articles.description: Stellantis brand Ram unveiled the 2025 Ramcharger, a battery electric truck that gets power from a gas-powered generator.
articles.content:
Don’t call it a plug-in hybrid. Or a gas-powered vehicle either. Stellantis brand Ram wants the 2025 Ram 1500 Ramcharger, which was revealed November 7, to be viewed as a battery electric truck.
